019package com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
022import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.types.StringFlag;
023import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
024
025public class GreetingFlag extends StringFlag<GreetingFlag> {
026
027    public static final GreetingFlag GREETING_FLAG_EMPTY = new GreetingFlag("");
028
029    protected GreetingFlag(@NonNull String value) {
030        super(
031                value,
032                TranslatableCaption.of("flags.flag_category_string"),
033                TranslatableCaption.of("flags.flag_description_greeting")
034        );
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public GreetingFlag parse(@NonNull String input) {
039        return flagOf(input);
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public GreetingFlag merge(@NonNull String newValue) {
044        return flagOf(this.getValue() + " " + newValue);
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public String toString() {
049        return this.getValue();
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public String getExample() {
054        return "<gold>Welcome to my plot!";
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    protected GreetingFlag flagOf(@NonNull String value) {
059        return new GreetingFlag(value);
060    }
061
062}
